title: Maly Amalat
text:
Maly Amalat () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">settlement</a>) in <a href="Bauntovsky%20District">Bauntovsky District</a>, <a href="Republic%20of%20Buryatia">Republic of Buryatia</a>, Russia. The population was 122 as of 2010. There are 5 streets.
Geography.
Maly Amalat is located 21 km southwest of <a href="Bagdarin">Bagdarin</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road, on the left bank of the <a href="Maly%20Amalat%20%28river%29">Maly Amalat</a> river, a tributary of the <a href="Amalat">Amalat</a>.
